# Overview

These files were used in creating John Helveston's presentation at the Sawtooth Software Conference [Turbo Choice Modeling Seminar](https://events.sawtoothsoftware.com/turboseminar) in San Antonio, Texas, April 19-23, 2021

The talk is titled, "The {logitr} R Package: Obtaining Willingness to Pay Estimates from Preference Space and Willingness to Pay Space Utility Models"

[`r fa("external-link-alt")` View slides in a new window](`r path_slides`){target="_blank"}

[`r fa("far fa-file-pdf")` Download slides as a PDF](`r path_pdf`)
